creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund
description: saucer form; finely moulded on the interior with two confronting dragons centered with the characters reading "Imperially Bestowed," encircled by moulded and stylized shou characters and archaistic dragons on rim; exterior with further pairs of confronting archaistic dragons; base with nine-character reignmark reading "Made by Wang Juisheng, Qianlong period"
title: Imperial Ink Cake
